NewsArticle.Title: New Tutorial Books
NewsArticle.Content:
Six new Tutorial Books will be released today. These books will assist new players to better understand the game. The tutorial books will be available to players who create a new character and by purchasing them through Riona (Mileth Inn) and Aiofe (Path Reception).
New Books: Tutorial Book Warrior Tutorial Book Rogue Tutorial Book Wizard Tutorial Book Priest Tutorial Book Monk Tutorial Book
